content.rendered:
Atlantic Airways (Nasdaq Iceland: FO-AIR, Faroese: Atlantsflog) is the national airline of the Faroe Islands, operating domestic helicopter services and international passenger services as well as search and rescue responsibilities from its base at Vágar Airport, on the Faroese island of Vágar. Most of its pilots are members of the Faroese Pilot Association.

Atlantic Airways Address:
 Atlantic Airways, Faroe islands,
Vágar Airport
FO-380 Sørvágur

Atlantic Airways UK

Phone:
 Reservations: +44 (0) 131 659 9944

Adress: Flight Directors UK GSA
Flighthouse,
Fernhill Road, Horley, Surrey RH6 9SY, United Kingdom

Email: For sales inquiries: sales@atlantic.fo

Atlantic Airways Administration phone number

  Phone: +298 34 10 00
Open: Monday – Friday 08.00 – 16.00

Atlantic Airways Flight and helicopter service number | Email

  Phone: +298 34 10 00
Open: Monday – Sunday 07.00 – 17.00
  E-mail: station@atlantic.fo

Atlantic Airways Customer Service number | Email

For new booking, existing booking, you can contact Atlantic Airways customer care number or email

  Phone: +298 34 10 00
Open: Monday – Friday 08.00 – 16.00
  E-mail: booking@atlantic.fo

For any comments, ideas or complaints, email to cr@atlantic.fo

For any inquiries about package tours, booking of flights, changing booking, hotel booking and car , email to booking@atlantic.fo

For any queries regarding baggage, check-in, helicopter and cargo, email to station@atlantic.fo

Atlantic Airways Marketing Department

  Phone: +298 34 10 00
Open: Monday – Friday 08.00 – 16.00
  E-mail: marketing@atlantic.fo

Atlantic Airways Official website: https://www.atlanticairways.com/en/

Atlantic Airways Online Check-in: www.Atlantic Airways.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note:Check In, up to 2 hours before departure.

Check Atlantic Airways schedule here: www.Atlantic Airways.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Atlantic Airways flight status here: www.Atlantic Airways.com/in/gb/flight status

Atlantic Airways Baggage Allowance

Atlantic Airways Baggage

View Atlantic Airways Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travel while pregnant in Atlantic Airways

Expectant mothers may travel in Atlantic Airways before 38 weeks

With Atlantic Airways, pregnant passengers who are 0 to 34 weeks may travel without providing a medical certificate.

For 35 – 37 weeks, pregnant passengers should provide a medical certificate stated that pregnancy is normal

Pregnant passengers cannot travel from 38 + weeks

For more information, please visit https://www.atlantic.fo/en/travel-info/before-flying/booking/pregnant-passengers/

Near-by Airports:

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Atlantic Airways

Total fleet: 3

Airbus A319

  • Airbus A319-100

Airbus A320

  • Airbus A320-200

British Aerospace BAe 146Avro RJ

  • British Aerospace 146-100
  • British Aerospace 146-200
  • British Aerospace Avro RJ100
  • British Aerospace Avro RJ8

Queries handled by Atlantic Airways Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, EuroBonus

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Atlantic Airways Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Atlantic Airways: (click on the stars below)
